bug-report.Summary: The 404 error is displayed in the new browser tab after clicking on the "Микола Палієнко" link in the footer
bug-report.Description: The 404 error is displayed in the new browser tab after clicking on the "Микола Палієнко" link in the footer
bug-report.Steps-To-Reproduce: 1. Open the site https://prom.ua/ua/ 2. Scroll down the page to the footer. 3. Click the "Про prom.ua" link. 4. Click the "Микола Палієнко" link. 5. Pay attention to the 404 error
bug-report.Actual-result: The 404 error is displayed in the new browser tab after clicking on the "Микола Палієнко" link in the footer
bug-report.Expected-result: The information about selected person is displayed in the new browser tab after clicking on the "Микола Палієнко" link in the footer
